itemDisplayName: Deploy two scale sets(one low-priority and one reg-priority)
description: This template allows you to deploy a large low-priority VM Scale Set with autoscale and a regular-priority VM Scale Set. These Scale Sets are behind a Standard load balancer.
summary: This template deploys two Scale Sets (one low-priority and one regular-priority) behind a Standard load balancer with NAT rules for RDP connections and Auto scale integrated
